resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108255</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108255</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212607</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Rocky Coastlines and Erosional Landforms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsige Küstenlinien und Erosional Landforms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littoraux rocheux et Formes de relief érosionnelles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coastlines rochosos e Landforms erosional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Linee costiere rocciose e Landforms erosional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύσκολες ακτές και erosional landforms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Líneas de la costa rocosas y Landforms erosional</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site provides Flash animations that demonstrate the formation of erosional coastal landforms. Visualizations illustrate the erosional processes responsible for the creation of arches and straightening coastlines. These resources may be integrated into lectures, labs or other activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site liefert grelle Animationen, die die 
Anordnung von erosional Küstenlandforms zeigen. 
Sichtbarmachungen veranschaulichen die erosional Prozesse, die 
für die Kreation der Bögen und Geraderichtenküstenlinien 
verantwortlich sind. Diese Betriebsmittel können in Vorträge, 
in Labors oder in andere Aktivitäten integriert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site fournit les animations instantanées qui 
démontrent la formation des formes de relief côtières érosionnelles. 
Les visualisations illustrent les processus érosionnels 
responsables de la création des voûtes et des littoraux de 
redressage. Ces ressources peuvent être intégrées dans des 
conférences, des laboratoires ou d'autres activités.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local fornece os animations flash que 
demonstram a formação de landforms litorais erosional. Os 
visualizations ilustram os processos erosional responsáveis para a 
criação dos arcos e coastlines endireitar. Estes recursos 
podem ser integrados em lectures, em laboratórios ou em outras 
atividades.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo fornisce le animazioni istantanee che
dimostrano la formazione dei landforms litoranei erosional. Le 
visualizzazioni illustrano i processi erosional responsabili della 
creazione degli archi e linee costiere raddrizzare. Queste 
risorse possono essere integrate nelle conferenze, nei laboratori o in
altre attività.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή παρέχει τις ζωτικότητες λάμψης που 
καταδεικνύουν το σχηματισμό erosional παράκτια landforms. 
Οι απεικονίσεις επεξηγούν τις erosional διαδικασίες 
αρμόδιες για τη δημιουργία των αψίδων και της αποκατάστασης των 
ακτών. Αυτά τα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς μπορούν να 
ενσωματωθούν στις διαλέξεις, τα εργαστήρια ή άλλες 
δραστηριότητες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio proporciona a las animaciones de 
destello que demuestran la formación de landforms costeros erosional.
Las visualizaciones ilustran los procesos erosional responsables
de la creación de arcos y las líneas de la costa el enderezarse. 
Estos recursos se pueden integrar en conferencias, laboratorios 
u otras actividades.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212607</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108255</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-history-of-earth-sciences-society</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
